title: Flippers and Nucleotides
text: Hello there! My name is Milagros Guadalupe Rivera and I am a PhD student at the University of California, Santa Cruz. My research is centered around marine mammal conservation using emerging genomic tools. More broadly, I am super interested in population genetics and its application towards the conservation and management of long-lived mammals.
